attributes.action: Strip broadcaster Jonathan Ross of his OBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Together with fellow broadcaster Russel Brand, Jonathan Ross made a series of obscene offensive telephone calls to the elderly actor Andrew Sachs.

This is the latest episode in a sorry series of unacceptable incidents involving Mr Ross.

J. Ross is a wealthy man, earning six million a year, so any financial penalty would mean little to him. 

I do not feel he deserves the OBE, and being stripped of it would send a clear message regarding the values and standards that the British public hold and expect.

rejection.details: Feedback on honours should be sent to the Ceremonial Secretariat.  Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
